00067 class NTBP_membrane_current_o : public NTBP_object_o {

00075 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00076 /* in mSiemens/cm^2 */
00077 virtual NTreal _maxConductivity() const = 0;
00079 NTreal _current() const { /*cerr << "Current in nA" << current << endl*/; return current; }
00081 NTreal _conductance() const { return conductance; }
00083 void Set_reversalPotential(NTreal eRev /* mV */) { reversalPotential = eRev;}
00085 NTreal _reversalPotential() const { return reversalPotential; }
00087 NTreal _temperature() const { return temperature; }
00089 NTreturn Set_temperature(NTreal newTemp) { NT_ASSERT(newTemp > NT_0_KELVIN); temperature = newTemp; return NT_SUCCESS;}
00091 NTreal _q10() const {return q10;}
00093 NTreturn Set_q10(NTreal newQ10) { q10 = newQ10; return NT_SUCCESS; }
00095 enum NTBPstochasticType _simulationMode() const { return simulationMode; }
00097 virtual void SetSimulationMode(enum NTBPstochasticType newMode){ simulationMode = newMode; }
00098 
00099 NTreturn Step(NTreal newVm /* in mV */){ ComputeRateConstants(newVm); /* UpdateRateConstantsAND*/StepCurrent(); ComputeConductance(); ComputeCurrent(newVm); return NT_SUCCESS;}
00100 /* in nA */
00101 NTreal ComputeCurrent(NTreal vM /* in mV */) { return Set_current( _conductance() /* mSiemens */ * 1000.0 /* mA/nA */ * (vM /* mV */- _reversalPotential()/* mV */ ) );}
00102 virtual NTreturn StepCurrent() = 0;
00104 virtual NTreal ComputeConductance() = 0;
00106 virtual void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal vM /* in mV */) = 0;
00108 virtual NTreal OpenChannels() const { cerr <<"NTBP_membrane_current_o::OpenChannels() - Error : Not Implemented." << endl; return -42; }
00110 virtual NTreal NumChannels() const { cerr <<"NTBP_membrane_current_o::NumChannels() - Error : Not Implemented." << endl; return -42; }
00112 virtual NTreal OpenChannelsRatio() const { cerr <<"NTBP_membrane_current_o::OpenChannelsRatio() - Error : Not Implemented." << endl; return -42; }
00113 virtual void ShowParam() const{ cerr << "NTBP_membrane_current_o::ShowParam - Warning : Not Implemented."<< endl;}
00114 /* Additional sweeps by the Gillespie Algorithm make the following method necessary */
00115 virtual NTreal ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant() const{ cerr << "NTBP_membrane_current_o::ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant - Error : Method should be overridden by a stochastic current class or not be called for a deterministic current class."<< endl; return 0;}
00116 NTreal ChannelStateTimeConstant() const { return ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant();}
00117 bool GillespieStep() {/*2DO is this necessary here*/StepCurrent();return ComputeGillespieStep();}
00118 virtual bool ComputeGillespieStep(){ cerr << "NTBP_membrane_current_o::ComputeGillespieStep- Error : Method should be overridden by a stochastic current class or not be called for a deterministic current class."<< endl; return NT_NOT_DERIVED;}
